Sentencas: One of Bitcoin's most significant problems is its seemingly insatiable use of electricity.
Titulo: Economic viability of bitcoin mining using a renewable-based SOFC power system to supply the electrical power demand

Sentencas: In the present research, along with providing the required power for Bitcoin (BTC) mining, a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) system fed either by natural gas or biogas as a renewable source of energy is used to supply the electricity demand.
Titulo: Economic viability of bitcoin mining using a renewable-based SOFC power system to supply the electrical power demand

Sentencas: Thermodynamic modeling for the fuel cell system is applied to determine the required biogas or natural gas.
Titulo: Economic viability of bitcoin mining using a renewable-based SOFC power system to supply the electrical power demand

Sentencas: For the proposed cases (grid-based, natural gas-fed SOFC and biogas fed SOFC), various scenarios depending on the Bitcoin price and mining difficulty are proposed.
Titulo: Economic viability of bitcoin mining using a renewable-based SOFC power system to supply the electrical power demand

Sentencas: Also, the economic viability for each scenario in several countries is investigated and compared.
Titulo: Economic viability of bitcoin mining using a renewable-based SOFC power system to supply the electrical power demand

Sentencas: Results indicate more profitability for grid-based mining in Bitcoin prices up to $20,000, but as the Bitcoin price increases SOFC based mining operations achieve reasonable profitability.
Titulo: Economic viability of bitcoin mining using a renewable-based SOFC power system to supply the electrical power demand

Sentencas: It is shown that Iran, Russia, and China with cumulative cash flows of $87,300, $77,200 and $70,500 respectively, are the best countries to mine BTC using grid electricity while Iran, Canada and Russia are the best countries using a natural gas-fed SOFC system.
Titulo: Economic viability of bitcoin mining using a renewable-based SOFC power system to supply the electrical power demand

Sentencas: While the profitability of SOFC-based mining is lower than grid-based mining, the latter method compensates with better sustainability and lower environmental costs.
Titulo: Economic viability of bitcoin mining using a renewable-based SOFC power system to supply the electrical power demand
